nodes.text: Uba IV was an astronomical object occupying the fourth orbital position in the Uba system, a part of the Barsa sector of the Mid Rim. Located on Standard Galactic Grid square J-6, it was the homeworld of the Ubese bounty hunter Boushh.
Uba IV was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the digital card trading application Star Wars: Card Trader on a card released in 2015.

In the Star Wars Legends continuity, Uba IV was a planet that was first mentioned in Peter M. Schweighofer's 1996 roleplaying sourcebook Shadows of the Empire Sourcebook for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game.
